Articles.Content:
I looked back a bit but no luck and ofc new patch = new issues right?

Yesterday I rescued 3 kerbals, theyre meant to be in my ship and rescued but theyre awol.

ksp is only moaning about 2 of my mods, ksp station parts (that i love dearly) and engineering redux (forgot why i wanted this).

any ideas of a fix or a hack to just add them back in to the game again in the save file?

 

this should be my log file thing....

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwUqjVidgAkuWmV2UjluSWNQS3M

 

assuming ive done it right.....

You can just recreate the Kerbals in the debug menu.

I suggest keeping an eye on this post and continuing to post your logs and such there.

 

Edited December 9, 2016 by Gianni1122

So this time I've picked a victim up around minmus.

While carrying him back to kerbin the mission says he's already landed and I can use him.

But the ship is still not evening the kerbin soi and the mission isn't complete.....

 

As a ps, when I do alt + f4 to bring up debugging all it does is change the mouse icon, do debugging menu thing. what am I doing wrong?
